mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_PH, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_PW, E.EMP_ACNT_STATE, E.EMP_IN, E.EMP_OUT, E.EMP_MAIL, E.EMP_REG, E.EMP_ZIP, E.EMP_ADD1, E.EMP_ADD2, E.ATCH_FILE_CD, E.EMP_DEPT_CD, E.EMP_JBPS_CD, AFD.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_SAVENM FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN ATCH_FILE_DETAIL AFD ON E.ATCH_FILE_CD = AFD.ATCH_FILE_CD ORDER BY EMP_DEPT_CD

SELECT CR.CHAT_RM_NO, CR.CHAT_RM_NM, CM.EMP_NO, CM.EMP_NAME, CM.EMP_DEPT_CD, CM.ATCH_FILE_CD, C.CHAT_CONT, C.CHAT_DATE, C.CHAT_RM_LIST_NO, AFD.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_SAVENM FROM CHAT_ROOM CR JOIN CHAT_MEMBER CM ON CR.CHAT_RM_NO = CM.CHAT_RM_NO JOIN CHAT C ON CM.CHAT_RM_LIST_NO = C.CHAT_RM_LIST_NO INNER JOIN ATCH_FILE_DETAIL AFD ON CM.ATCH_FILE_CD = AFD.ATCH_FILE_CD ORDER BY C.CHAT_DATE DESC

SELECT A.CHAT_NO, A.CHAT_RM_LIST_NO, A.CHAT_RM_NO, A.CHAT_CONT, A.CHAT_FILE_CD, A.CHAT_DATE, A.EMP_NO, B.EMP_NAME, B.EMP_DEPT_CD, B.ATCH_FILE_CD, AFD.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_SAVENM FROM CHAT A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO INNER JOIN ATCH_FILE_DETAIL AFD ON B.ATCH_FILE_CD = AFD.ATCH_FILE_CD WHERE A.CHAT_RM_NO = #{chatRmNo} ORDER BY CHAT_DATE
SELECT CM.EMP_NO, CM.EMP_NAME FROM CHAT_ROOM CR JOIN CHAT_MEMBER CM ON CR.CHAT_RM_NO = CM.CHAT_RM_NO WHERE CR.CHAT_RM_NO = #{chatRmNo}
